channel.title: Mark of the Beast
channel.description:
As many of you may know, hopefully at least those that are Christians, the Mark of the Beast (666) symbolizes the Devil. I'm about to show you something that may or may not freak you out. Below, is an array of letters, or more-so known as the English alphabet, which consists of 26 letters, A-Z. Each letter will be represented as a number, starting from 6 and ending at 156.
A - [b]6[/b] B - [b]12[/b] C - [b]18[/b] D - [b]24[/b] E - [b]30[/b] F - [b]36[/b] G - [b]42[/b] H - [b]48[/b] I - [b]54[/b] J - [b]60[/b] K - [b]66[/b] L - [b]72[/b] M - [b]78[/b] N -[b] 84[/b] O -[b] 90[/b] P - [b]96[/b] Q - [b]102[/b] R - [b]108[/b] S - [b]114[/b] T - [b]120[/b] U - [b]126[/b] V - [b]132[/b] W - [b]138[/b] X - [b]144[/b] Y - [b]150[/b] Z - [b]156[/b]
If you haven't noticed already, each number that represents a letter is a multiple of 6.
You are probably wondering where I'm going with this, so let me show you.
Below are three terms that are significant in some form:
[ol][li]Computer[/li] [li]Adolf A Hitler[/li] [li]Santa Claus[/li][/ol]
If you take the numeral multiple listed above and add them up for each letter in the words above, you will get this result.
Computer: C([b]18[/b]) + O([b]90[/b]) + M([b]78[/b]) + P([b]96[/b]) + U([b]126[/b]) + T([b]120[/b]) + E([b]30[/b]) + R([b]108[/b]) = [b][i]666 [/i][/b] Adolf A Hitler: A([b]6[/b]) + D([b]24[/b]) + O([b]90[/b]) + L([b]72[/b]) + F([b]36[/b]) + A([b]6[/b]) + H([b]48[/b]) + I([b]54[/b]) + T([b]120[/b]) + L([b]72[/b]) + E([b]30[/b]) + R([b]108[/b]) = [b][i]666[/i][/b] Santa Claus: S([b]114[/b]) + A([b]6[/b]) + N([b]84[/b]) + T([b]120[/b]) + A([b]6[/b]) + C([b]18[/b]) + L([b]72[/b]) + A([b]6[/b]) + U([b]126[/b]) + S([b]114[/b]) = [b][i]666[/i][/b]
If you don't believe me, get a calculator and add them for yourself. Now, I'm going to explain why these terms are related to the mark of the beast.
[b]Computer[/b]: There have been many apocalypse theories, one involving the Earth being ruled by computers, or robots.
[b]Adolf A Hilter[/b]: Adolf Hitler was an infamous German dictator, which ruled by force and threat. Many have compared Obama to Hitler, and there is another theory that the devil has sent Obama to destroy the United States of America.
[b]Santa Claus[/b]: The devil lies to people to obtain what he wants and also steal the souls of people, and so does Santa Claus. He says he lives in the North Pole; he does not. Also, if you move the 'n' in 'Santa' behind the last 'a', the term will be seemingly similar to Satan's Clause, or a contract of Satan.
You can interpret this however you would like to, as I said before, this is more likely to catch the eyes of a Christian.

To take this further.
666 is the number of Satan.
777 is the number of God.
888 is Joseph Stalin added together.
That means he is the greatest of them.

item.title: Mark of the Beast
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:4, topic:478812”]“Adolf A Hilter”
So I’m allowed to put in a random A?

“Bowser A jr”
Equals to 666.

I think people know this by now, but my theory is that you are very stupid.[/quote]

It isn’t a random A, but it represents his father’s name, which was Alois. Neither of them had a middle initial.

Edit: Of course, you can modify any word in the English alphabet and end up with 666 using the values above, but if you had half a brain you would realize each value is a multiple of 6, so you can add any combination of the values and still have a multiple of 6. It isn’t so much the values that were significant, but the terms I posted.

Read full topic

item.title: Mark of the Beast
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

As many of you may know, hopefully at least those that are Christians, the Mark of the Beast (666) symbolizes the Devil. I’m about to show you something that may or may not freak you out. Below, is an array of letters, or more-so known as the English alphabet, which consists of 26 letters, A-Z. Each letter will be represented as a number, starting from 6 and ending at 156.

A - 6
B - 12
C - 18
D - 24
E - 30
F - 36
G - 42
H - 48
I - 54
J - 60
K - 66
L - 72
M - 78
N - 84
O - 90
P - 96
Q - 102
R - 108
S - 114
T - 120
U - 126
V - 132
W - 138
X - 144
Y - 150
Z - 156

If you haven’t noticed already, each number that represents a letter is a multiple of 6.

You are probably wondering where I’m going with this, so let me show you.

Below are three terms that are significant in some form:

[ol][li]Computer[/li]
[li]Adolf A Hitler[/li]
[li]Santa Claus[/li][/ol]

If you take the numeral multiple listed above and add them up for each letter in the words above, you will get this result.

Computer: C(18) + O(90) + M(78) + P(96) + U(126) + T(120) + E(30) + R(108) = 666
Adolf A Hitler: A(6) + D(24) + O(90) + L(72) + F(36) + A(6) + H(48) + I(54) + T(120) + L(72) + E(30) + R(108) = 666
Santa Claus: S(114) + A(6) + N(84) + T(120) + A(6) + C(18) + L(72) + A(6) + U(126) + S(114) = 666

If you don’t believe me, get a calculator and add them for yourself. Now, I’m going to explain why these terms are related to the mark of the beast.

Computer: There have been many apocalypse theories, one involving the Earth being ruled by computers, or robots.

Adolf A Hilter: Adolf Hitler was an infamous German dictator, which ruled by force and threat. Many have compared Obama to Hitler, and there is another theory that the devil has sent Obama to destroy the United States of America.

Santa Claus: The devil lies to people to obtain what he wants and also steal the souls of people, and so does Santa Claus. He says he lives in the North Pole; he does not. Also, if you move the ‘n’ in ‘Santa’ behind the last ‘a’, the term will be seemingly similar to Satan’s Clause, or a contract of Satan.

You can interpret this however you would like to, as I said before, this is more likely to catch the eyes of a Christian.

Read full topic
